items.title: Immanence
items.description: IMMANENCE Diptych I: "Natura Sive Deus" (Nature, or God) Serpentine forms emerge from golden and crimson grounds - energy organizing, awareness taking shape. The Arabic "هوشیاری" (awareness) and "اعتدال" (balance) anchor vision in concept without doctrine. Spinoza made visible: no ghost in the machi...
